args.content:
import Mathlib
open TopologicalSpace Filter
open scoped Topology

/-- If E and F are finite-dimensional real normed spaces with dim E < dim F,
then the image of any C^1 map f : E â†’ F is nowhere dense. -/
theorem isNowhereDense_range_of_dim_lt {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace â„ E]
  [FiniteDimensional â„ E] {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace â„ F] [FiniteDimensional â„ F]
  (f : E â†’ F) (hf : ContDiff â„ 1 f) (h : Finrank â„ E < Finrank â„ F) : IsNowhereDense (Set.range f) := by sorry

/-- If m < n, any C^1 map f : (Fin m â†’ â„) â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„) has nowhere dense image. -/
theorem isNowhereDense_range_fin_fun_of_lt {m n : Nat} (h : m < n) {f : (Fin m â†’ â„) â†’ (Fin n â†’ â„)}
  (hf : ContDiff â„ 1 f) : IsNowhereDense (Set.range f) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open Set

variable {ğ•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ğ•œ]
variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ğ•œ E]
variable {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ğ•œ F]
variable {H : Type*} [TopologicalSpace H] {G : Type*} [TopologicalSpace G]
variable {I : ModelWithCorners ğ•œ E H} {J : ModelWithCorners ğ•œ F G}
variable {M : Type*} [TopologicalSpace M] [ChartedSpace H M]
variable {N : Type*} [TopologicalSpace N] [ChartedSpace G N]
variable {n : WithTop â„•âˆ}
variable (Ï† : M â†’ N)

/-- The set of points where a smooth map is a local diffeomorphism is open. -/
theorem isOpen_set_of_isLocalDiffeomorphAt :
  IsOpen {x : M | IsLocalDiffeomorphAt I J n Ï† x} := by sorry
